name: Rehabilitation unit
text: There is established within the department of labor and industrial relations a rehabilitation unit.  All professional and clerical employees of this unit shall be appointed by the director.  The rehabilitation unit shall have the duties and responsibilities provided in section 386-25.  Employees of the unit shall be subject to chapter 76. [L 1980, c 224, §1; am L 2000, c 253, §150]
